long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Stack is an extremely captivating hyper-casual game where players stack blocks simply by tapping. The goal of the game is to create a tower that is as tall as possible in order to achieve a high score. Its addictive gameplay makes it hard to put down once you start playing.

With this extension version, players can easily and conveniently experience the game without having to download or install any software on their device. The game requires players to stack blocks on top of each other precisely to create the tallest column possible, while avoiding obstacles. With beautiful graphics and an enjoyable gaming experience, the Stack extension version on Chrome Browser is an excellent choice for entertainment and improving your concentration skills.
